name: Quantum Ryder: The Ballad of Lionel Ryder
name_original: Quantum Ryder: The Ballad of Lionel Ryder
description:
Lionel Ryder, secret agent and professional motorcycle racer, has been thrown back in time! Help him gather the tachyon batteries necessary to power his time-bike before the next time-jump so he can get back to his own time!

Ride or Die, Ryder!

Accelerate: W

Decelerate: S

Steer: A and D

Credits:

Nate Berens, @ludodrome

David Firth, @maximumoverdave

Matt Graczyk, @graczykmatt

Brian Hudson, @Brian_D_Hudson
